channel.title: Crash PI [REP++]
channel.description:
Every time I barrage a NPC I get this error in my client cmd.
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/151/17285514.jpg/][IMG]http://img151.imageshack.us/img151/9521/17285514.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: Crash PI [REP++]
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:4, topic:398735”][quote author=xxifish i x link=topic=495873.msg3625331#msg3625331 date=1307800702]
either have your utorrent running
or close the torrent and run source should work
[/quote]

What the fuckshit has µtorrent to do with fucking client to server connection???

OP : as stated by Ravens , the client you are using is incompatible with your server.
I had the same error yesterday when i tried to find a 459 client for PI :D[/quote]

No it’s NpcSize, not compatibility. It’s either in NpcHandler or Npc.java and I forgot the method.

Read full topic

item.title: Crash PI [REP++]

item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“xxifish i x, post:3, topic:398735”]either have your utorrent running
or close the torrent and run source should work :P[/quote]

What the fuckshit has µtorrent to do with fucking client to server connection???

OP : as stated by Ravens , the client you are using is incompatible with your server.
I had the same error yesterday when i tried to find a 459 client for PI
